Overview

The following list of components exist within the funnel builder to reduce repetative code writing, as well as ensure style consistency.

Table of Contents

  • The following list of components exist within the funnel builder to reduce repetative code writing, as well as ensure style consistency.
...

Cards

Project Card

  • Usage *

This card can be used to display lists of user projects i.e. funnels, chatbots, etc.

** import **

import projectCard from '@/components/UI/Cards/projectCard.vue'

Example Parent Component

<template>
    <section>
        <project-Card 
                  v-for="item in projectData"
                  :item="item"
                  :key="item.id"
        />
    </section>    
</template>

<script>
import projectCard from '@/components/UI/Cards/projectCard.vue'
    
    export default {
        data () {
            return {
                projectData: [
                {
                    projectName : 'Name',
                    projectId : '123'
                },
                {
                    projectName : 'Name',
                    projectId : '123'
                }
                ]
                
            }
        },
        components: {
        }
    }
</script>

<style>
    
</style>

Project Card Component

<template>
  <div class="column is-4">
    <div class="flex-card light-bordered light-shadow project-card card-overflow">
      <div class="header">
        <h4 class="no-margin-bottom">{{ item.projectName }}</h4>
        <!-- Task card dropdown -->
        <div class="dropdown is-right dropdown-trigger">
          <div class="button" aria-haspopup="true" aria-controls="dropdown-menu">
            <span class="material-icons">more_vert</span>
          </div>
          <div class="dropdown is-right">
            <div class="dropdown-trigger">
              <button class="button" aria-haspopup="true" aria-controls="dropdown-menu">
              <span class="material-icons">more_vert</span>
              </button>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown-menu" role="menu">
              <div class="dropdown-content">
                <div class="dropdown-item">
                  <p>Edit</p>
                </div>
                <div class="dropdown-item">
                  <p>Details</p>
                </div>
                <hr class="dropdown-divider">
                <div class="dropdown-item">
                  <p>Delete</p>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="progress-block">
        <progress class="progress is-xs is-blue" value="100" max="100">100%</progress>
        <div class="task-count">
          <span class="sl sl-icon-check"></span>
          <span>2/8</span>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
         props: ['item'],      
        data () {
            return {
            }
        },
        components: {
        }
    }
</script>

<style>
    
</style>

*** Output ***

Name

more_vert

Edit

Details

Delete

100%
2/8

Name

more_vert

Edit

Details

Delete

100%
2/8
